name: Ludo
info:
• 简体中文名: 卢多
  • 别名: 魯多
  • 别名: ルード
  • 性别: 男
detail: Ludo is Star’s main recurring villain, a unique nemesis from Mewni, who is occasionally threatening regardless of his size, ego, insecurity and inept army of monsters. More than anything, he wants to get his tiny hands on Star’s wand so he can take over the universe!
